All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Absorb
Absorb echo directive, for stopping the radiation of a certain echo.
Circle
Class defining a circle shape.
Continue
Continue jump directive, for continuing the execution of a previous movement.
Directive
Interface for swarm strategy directives.
DirectiveException
Runtime exception for strategy directives.
DirectiveFactory
Interface defining a directive factory.
DirectiveType
Enum of available directive types to categorize directives.
DomainException
Runtime exception for domain.
DomainParser
Parser for domain creation from an external source.
DomainParserException
Exception for errors during domain parsing.
Done
Done jump directive, for ending a loop.
Drone
Class representing a swarm drone.
EchoDirective
Interface for echo directives.
Ellipse
Class defining an ellipse shape.
Follow
Follow movement directive, for setting a drone direction to the average position of drones radiating a specific echo.
HiveMind
 
HiveMindException
Exception for hive mind errors.
JumpDirective
Interface for jump directives.
Move
Move movement directive, for setting the drone's direction and speed.
MovementDirective
Interface for movement directives.
ParserDirective
Enum of available parser directives to compose the swarm strategy.
Polygon
Class defining a polygon shape.
Position
Immutable class for all swarm positions representation.
PositionException
Runtime exception for positions inside the swarm's domain.
Radiate
Radiate echo directive, for starting the radiation of a certain echo.
Rectangle
Class defining a rectangle shape.
Region
Class defining a region inside the swarm's domain.
Repeat
Repeat jump directive, for repeating the execution of set of directives for several times.
Shape
Interface defining a shape.
ShapeException
Runtime exception for region shapes.
ShapeFactory
Interface defining a shape factory.
ShapeType
Enum of available shapes to define the swarm's domain.
Stop
Stop movement directive, for stopping the drone and terminating its life.
StrategyException
Runtime exception for strategy.
StrategyParser
Parser for strategy creation from an external source.
StrategyParserException
Exception for errors during strategy parsing.
SwarmDirectiveFactory
Swarm implementation of the directive factory.
SwarmDomainParser
Swarm implementation of the domain parser.
SwarmException
Runtime exception for all swarm errors.
SwarmProperties
Static class defining the swarm properties.
SwarmShapeFactory
Swarm implementation of the shape factory.
SwarmState
Class representing the current state of the swarm.
SwarmStrategyParser
Parser for swarm strategy creation from external source.
SwarmUtils
Static utility class for swarm operations.
Until
Until jump directive, for repeating the execution of set of directives until a specific signal is perceived.
